comment_data.body: Maybe this is why the MessageImage feature doesn't work?

Yes This happen to me also .. i think there is a different way or something lost here like a parameter should be increase to allow the server to accept large data

like : long_msg or something else by binary

Time to look up the related code in Yowsup

https://github.com/tgalal/yowsup
@Starsong I already did, it's the same way as WhatsAPI.
@Starsong ... is it working with you with big size messages ??
@eslamo No. Not working for me too.
does anyone can figure the missing part in the code ??

i found that message must be at max 255 chars to be delivered ..  is this mean anything for anyone ??

i think there is something must be written after 255 chars to accept all of the message and deliver it

@eslamo @Dawnation I figured it out, well at least how to send more data, looking at this trace https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/issues/126#issuecomment-10193915

You have to add to the media node the attribute encoding="raw" then you can send more bytes, but I think in order to work the image sending you have to provide some kind of hash no clue on how is generated its not md5,crc,sha1 or else, maybe it's rehashed.
@beldar  so you figured out how to send image? can you provide the php code?

I just managed to do it in 2 ways
1. Sending the image without the thumbnail, hence empty node. In which case
on the phone appears a blank thumbnail but a correct full size image.
2. Sending a thumbnail of < 320 byted which was a back 40x40 pixels square
but I dont think you can make a proper thumbnail that way.

So no desired solution

El 08/11/2012, a les 21:55, Andrea <notifications@github.com> va escriure:

@beldar <https://github.com/beldar> so you figured out how to send image?
can you provide the php code?

â€”
Reply to this email directly or view it on
GitHub<https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/issues/146#issuecomment-10204510>.

Since the filehash is about the file uploaded i dont think it's checked in the sending of the message. I guess it's checked when you click the show button on the thumbnails. There must be another reason about the problem of the size....

I can send big thumbnail; 22K. But sometimes only.
I do not know why sometimes it works and sometimes it does not work...
@jandrito80 can you provide the code that are you using and the thumbnail want to check. This issue is very important to me..I'm trying to fix it.

I managed to send a picture of 1162 bytes, but the same problem occurs to me, in the sending process does not fail but does not reach to your destination. Sometimes it reaches the recipient and sometimes not
It was this all along... https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/pull/157/files
what about long message still no solution ?
sending with apostrophe ' doesn't work as well.
@beldar , I corrected the variable $ ret but the same happens to me intermittently sends images but sometimes the message reaches its destination and sometimes not

title: Not able to send message with node date longer than 320 bytes
